title: TestWeaver Configuration
description:
Schema for the TestWeaver CLI configuration file (default.json or testweaver.json).
This schema provides autocompletion and validation in compatible IDEs.

patterns.description: One or more glob patterns for YAML files to be processed (e.g., 'tests/**/*.yaml').

ignore.description: List of glob file patterns to exclude from matched files (e.g., '**/temp/*.yaml').

verbose.description: Enable verbose output for more detailed information.

debug.description: Enable debug output for highly detailed debugging information (most verbose).

silent.description: Suppress all output except critical errors (least verbose).

dryRun.description: Perform a dry run: simulate file generation without writing to disk.

testKeyword.description: Specify keyword for test blocks ('it' or 'test').

noCleanup.description: Do not delete generated .test.js files when source YAML is unlinked in watch mode.

quick.description: For the 'init' command: Skip asking questions and generate the configuration file with default values.

force.description: For the 'init' command: Force overwriting the configuration file if it already exists.

no-defaults.description: For the 'init' command: Only include settings in the generated file whose values differ from defaults.
